item.description:
The chapter will have the annual school supply drive to benefit students of the Manchester area.

The South Windsor Jaycees and the Office Depot store at the Shoppes at Buckland Hills will join to provide back-to-school supplies for youngsters enrolled in the after-school programs administered by Nutmeg Big Brothers Big Sister at the Natchaug School, the W.B. Sweeney School, the Windham Center School and the North Windham School.

Our goal is to secure back-to-school kits for approximately 100 students, supplies not covered by existing school budgets. Come on out and help us make a difference for these kids!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be out front organizing back to school kits
item.name: School Supply Drive
